content: this beautiful square is so quick to make with the quick and simple repeating pattern this square is quick to work up change up the number of colors or number of row between color changes to give it a whole new look yarn lions brand vannas choice black white rose shocking hook 5 5mm/i stitches fl - front loop only chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back loop only st s stitch es space space dont limit yourself to the 12x12 square how beautiful would this be as an afghan copyright katidcreations 2016
